name: Bard
description: Charismatic performers who sway crowds with music, story, or wit.
classItems: A romance novel or a letter never opened

hopeFeature.name: Make a Scene
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to Distract a target within Close range, giving them –2 Difficulty.

classFeature.name: Rally
classFeature.description: Once per session give each ally (and yourself) a Rally Die (d6) that can be spent to boost rolls or clear Stress.

name: Druid
description: Guardians of the wild who channel primal magic and shift into beasts.
classItems: A small bag of rocks and bones or a strange pendant found in the dirt

hopeFeature.name: Evolution
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to transform into a Beastform without Stress, raising one trait by +1.

classFeature.name: Beastform
classFeature.description: Mark Stress to magically transform into a creature of your tier, gaining its features and bonuses.

name: Guardian
description: Stalwart protectors whose ferocity shields their companions.
classItems: A totem from your mentor or a secret key

hopeFeature.name: Frontline Tank
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to clear 2 Armor Slots.

classFeature.name: Unstoppable
classFeature.description: Once per long rest become Unstoppable, reducing damage severity and adding an Unstoppable Die to damage rolls.

name: Ranger
description: Cunning hunters and trackers who strike with patient precision.
classItems: A trophy from your first kill or a seemingly broken compass

hopeFeature.name: Hold Them Off
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to apply a successful weapon attack roll to up to two additional adversaries in range.

classFeature.name: Ranger’s Focus
classFeature.description: Spend Hope to mark a target as your Focus, gaining tracking and damage bonuses against them.

name: Rogue
description: Masters of stealth, deceit, and devastating underhanded strikes.
classItems: A set of forgery tools or a grappling hook

hopeFeature.name: Rogue’s Dodge
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to gain +2 Evasion until an attack succeeds against you or you rest.

classFeature.name: Cloaked
classFeature.description: Whenever you would be Hidden you are instead Cloaked—remaining unseen until you act or move in sight.

name: Seraph
description: Divinely empowered crusaders who heal allies and smite foes.
classItems: A bundle of offerings or a sigil of your god

hopeFeature.name: Life Support
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to clear a Hit Point on an ally within Close range.

classFeature.name: Prayer Dice
classFeature.description: Roll d4 Prayer Dice equal to your Spellcast trait each session; spend them to protect or aid allies.

name: Sorcerer
description: Innate spellcasters who channel raw, volatile magic.
classItems: A whispering orb or a family heirloom

hopeFeature.name: Volatile Magic
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to reroll any number of damage dice on a magic attack.

classFeature.name: Arcane Sense
classFeature.description: Sense the presence of magical people and objects within Close range.

name: Warrior
description: Disciplined weapon masters who excel in open combat.
classItems: The drawing of a lover or a sharpening stone

hopeFeature.name: No Mercy
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to gain +1 bonus to all attack rolls until your next rest.

classFeature.name: Attack of Opportunity
classFeature.description: React when an adjacent enemy moves away, choosing to halt, damage, or follow them on success.

name: Wizard
description: Scholars of arcane lore who wield studied magic and secrets.
classItems: A book you’re trying to translate or a tiny harmless elemental pet

hopeFeature.name: Not This Time
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 Hope to force an adversary within Far range to reroll an attack or damage roll.

classFeature.name: Prestidigitation
classFeature.description: Perform harmless magical tricks at will—lighting candles, minor illusions, mending, etc.
